name: DocumentOrShadowRoot.pictureInPictureElement
description: The DocumentOrShadowRoot.pictureInPictureElement read-only property returns the HTMLVideoElement that is currently being presented in picture-in-picture mode in this document, or null if picture-in-picture mode is not currently in use.

refs.name: Unknown
refs.description: The definition of 'Document.pictureInPictureElement' in the 'Unknown' specification.
